subject: Addendum to Standard RFP Documents for engagement of Technical Consultants- Extension of the provision of reduced Omnibus Bank Guarantee up to 31.03.2022 in the RFP documents
text: HRay veiv TTTHNf nfetarut 8414 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 91 (sm Wdev aik_{oTHTf HAT4) Ya77 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) vi-5 & 6, #azr-10 , ERGT, W ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Consultancy/2022 Policy Circular No: 10.1.31 dated 27th January2022 (Decision taken in on E- office F.No.NHAI/11033/CGMF)/2022-OmnibusBG (Comp No 128051)) Sub: Addendum to Standard RFP Documents for engagement of Technical Consultants- Extension of the provision of reduced Omnibus Bank Guarantee up to 31.03.2022 in the RFP documents MoRTH vide letter No. Covid-19/Road Map/ JS(H)/2020 dated 04.01.2022 has extended some relief measures to Contractors /Developers along with extension of provision of reduced Performance BG and Policy has accordingly been  issued by NHAI vide Policy circular no 18.77/2022 dated 17.01.22 . 2_ The relief in this regard was earlier provided vide MoRTH OM No_ F No.G-20016/01/2020- TF-II dated 17.11.2020. Accordingly, the Policy Circular regarding, inter alia, reduction in Performance Security was issued vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 3.1..27 dated 19.11.2020. Policy Circular No.10.1.25 dated 09 12.2020 for reduced Omnibus Performance Security in consultancy contracts was also issued in line with these directions. 3_ The above provision of Omnibus performance Security as per Policy Circular No.10.1.25 dated 09.12.2020 for engagement of technical consultants is hereby extended up to 31.03.2022, with other provisions of the Policy Circular remaining unchanged. 4 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2 .
